title: The Church of Jesus Christ
description: A musical video with lyrics and images for the children's song "The Church of Jesus Christ."
content:
With conviction
I belong to The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints.
I know who I am.
I know God’s plan.
I’ll follow him in faith.
I believe in the Savior, Jesus Christ.
I’ll honor his name.
I’ll do what is right;
I’ll follow his light.
His truth I will proclaim.
Words and music:
Janice Kapp Perry, b. 1938. © 1989 IRI
Doctrine and Covenants 115:4–5
